body: @leefdraw if you get off to NTR you are by definition a beta, because you're either getting off to the revenge fantasy of stealing an attractive lady you can't get from their husband, or getting off by putting yourself in the shoes of the husband being cucked, so it's literally beta whichever side of the persuasion you're on. That's why you should keep your wife happy and content!  (if you're lucky enough  to even get one lol)

She's so fucking hotttt 😍😍😍❤❤❤❤ she's got nice juicy lips❤. I neeď all her meat holes 😍😍😍❤❤❤❤

An inattentive husband making his wife feel lonely. That's what caused her to cheat in the first place
I got mixed feelings about this one :/

This was a fairly good work, especially for an NTR work.  And when I say good, I don't necessarily mean it was hot (to be completely honest my dick was in my pants the entire time), but am just referring to the technical quality of the doujin.    I liked that the wife willingly did it, rather than being blackmailed or raped, which is the big issue with most NTR works.  I'm a vanilla-fag by most definitions (I suppose wholesome-fag works better), but I don't necessarily despise all NTR,  I feel like there is some good, "vanilla", if you will, NTR works, this being one of them. The art style was good, and the ending sure sucked for the husband, not just to realize that your wife is cheating on you, but her being degraded to a masochistic whore.
Gotta re visit all this author work today. Been a long time since i read his NTR works.

I mean, he did on the last page...plus she was pretty heavy in disguise, its not like you'd think your wife was the one putting on a public show like that. It clicked when he heard her voice, that's not too shabby all things considered.
Lol that cuck couldn’t even recognize his own wife
